docs.snippet: Hillary Clinton named U.S. Senator Tim Kaine as her running mate on Friday, opting for an experienced governing partner who will help her present the Democratic ticket as a steady alternative to the unpredictable campaign of Republican presidentia...
docs.lead_paragraph: Hillary Clinton named U.S. Senator Tim Kaine as her running mate on Friday, opting for an experienced governing partner who will help her present the Democratic ticket as a steady alternative to the unpredictable campaign of Republican presidential rival Donald Trump.

headline.main: Clinton Picks Kaine, Able Governing Partner, as Running Mate
headline.print_headline: Clinton Picks Kaine, Able Governing Partner, as Running Mate

docs.snippet: President Barack Obama fiercely rejected Donald Trump's depiction of an America in crisis on Friday, arguing that violent crime and illegal immigration have plunged under his leadership to their lowest rates in decades....
docs.lead_paragraph: President Barack Obama fiercely rejected Donald Trump's depiction of an America in crisis on Friday, arguing that violent crime and illegal immigration have plunged under his leadership to their lowest rates in decades.

headline.main: Obama Rejects Trump Depiction of US in Crisis
headline.print_headline: Obama Rejects Trump Depiction of US in Crisis

docs.snippet: Despite promising "the truth, and nothing else" in his convention speech, Donald Trump presented the nation with a series of previously debunked claims and some new ones Thursday night — about the U.S. tax burden, the perils facing police, H...
docs.lead_paragraph: Despite promising "the truth, and nothing else" in his convention speech, Donald Trump presented the nation with a series of previously debunked claims and some new ones Thursday night — about the U.S. tax burden, the perils facing police, Hillary Clinton's record and more.

headline.main: AP FACT CHECK: Trump Resurfaces Debunked Claims in Speech
headline.print_headline: AP FACT CHECK: Trump Resurfaces Debunked Claims in Speech

docs.snippet: Tim Kaine has an Election Day tradition when his name is on the ballot. The avid outdoorsman votes early, then goes hiking in the woods with friends and family for a few hours of calm away from the nervous last-minute energy of political campaigns...
docs.lead_paragraph: Tim Kaine has an Election Day tradition when his name is on the ballot. The avid outdoorsman votes early, then goes hiking in the woods with friends and family for a few hours of calm away from the nervous last-minute energy of political campaigns.

headline.main: Self-Assured, Kaine Brings a Steady Hand to Clinton Ticket
headline.print_headline: Self-Assured, Kaine Brings a Steady Hand to Clinton Ticket

docs.snippet: People seeking a deeper understanding of Donald Trump's economic policy came up empty-handed this week at the Republican National Convention....
docs.lead_paragraph: People seeking a deeper understanding of Donald Trump's economic policy came up empty-handed this week at the Republican National Convention.

headline.main: To Wonks Hungry for Policy Details, Trump Team Serves Lighter Fare
headline.print_headline: To Wonks Hungry for Policy Details, Trump Team Serves Lighter Fare

docs.snippet: During the primaries, Donald Trump threw red-meat rhetoric to supporters, pledging to build a wall on the Mexico border and to ban Muslim immigrants. He even told at least one crowd that he wanted to punch a demonstrator who disrupted an event....
docs.lead_paragraph: During the primaries, Donald Trump threw red-meat rhetoric to supporters, pledging to build a wall on the Mexico border and to ban Muslim immigrants. He even told at least one crowd that he wanted to punch a demonstrator who disrupted an event.

headline.main: Critics: Trump Speech Signals Shift to Coded Race Language

docs.snippet: Members of the Democratic Party's liberal wing on Thursday nervously awaited Hillary Clinton's announcement in coming days of a vice presidential running mate, urging her to choose someone who opposes a massive Pacific free trade deal and backs to...
docs.lead_paragraph: Members of the Democratic Party's liberal wing on Thursday nervously awaited Hillary Clinton's announcement in coming days of a vice presidential running mate, urging her to choose someone who opposes a massive Pacific free trade deal and backs tough Wall Street reform.

headline.main: Clinton Faces Pressure to Pick VP Who Is Tough on Trade, Wall Street
headline.print_headline: Clinton Faces Pressure to Pick VP Who Is Tough on Trade, Wall Street

docs.snippet: A day after accepting the Republican presidential nomination, Donald Trump pivoted back to the GOP primaries on Friday, choosing to re-litigate a pair of monthsold battles with rival Ted Cruz....

docs.snippet: The Virginia Supreme Court ruled on Friday against Democratic Governor Terry McAuliffe's order restoring voting rights to more than 200,000 felons who completed their sentences, court documents show....
